name: Marathon Venture Capital
description: Marathon caters to those who are willing to go after the seemingly impossible. Those who persevere in the face of adversity. The ones who will ultimately get to redefine entire industries. We aim to bring together everyone who can enable founders to realize their ambitions. We are network builders as well as company builders. Creators of value who are able to see where interests align. We stand for limitless ambition, uncompromising integrity, radical openness and giving back to our community. Marathon is a long-term venture and we are just getting started.
investmentAreas: AI, Biotech, Cybersecurity, Defense Tech, Robotics, Mobility, Saas

name: VentureFriends
description: Skylaunchpad Venture Capital is a firm founded by seasoned entrepreneurs and angel investors Apostolos and George, who have a successful track record of founding and investing in companies like e-food and Beat. Since its inception in 2016 with the launch of VF1, the firm has grown through subsequent funds VF2 and VF3, reaching a total of €170M, focusing on early-stage, scalable B2C and B2B startups across Europe. They are committed to supporting ambitious founders as partners, providing hands-on assistance through the highs and lows of their entrepreneurial journeys.
investmentAreas: Software, Fintech, SaaS

name: venturefriends.vc
description: Marathon caters to those who are willing to go after the seemingly impossible. Those who persevere in the face of adversity. The ones who will ultimately get to redefine entire industries. We aim to bring together everyone who can enable founders to realize their ambitions. We are network builders as well as company builders. Creators of value who are able to see where interests align. We stand for limitless ambition, uncompromising integrity, radical openness and giving back to our community. Marathon is a long-term venture and we are just getting started.
investmentAreas: Software, AI, ML, Pharmaceutical,

name: Big Pi Ventures
description: Genesis Ventures partners with teams developing exceptional technologies or ingenious business models. They invest where there are opportunities to improve people's lives or transform entire industries, providing both capital and advice based on extensive experience. Anchored in Greece and targeting global markets, Genesis Ventures is dedicated to supporting innovative startups. Follow them for more updates.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Finance, Financial Services, Software, Venture Capital

name: Metavallon VC
description: Metavallon is a venture capital fund investing in early-stage technology startups connected to Greece, providing initial funding up to €1.5M. They offer hands-on support to Seed and Seed+ stage investments, focusing on sectors like transportation, energy, AI, and fintech. Metavallon aims to drive innovation by partnering with exceptional tech companies and helping them expand globally.
investmentAreas: Transportation & Mobility, Energy & Cleantech, Space & Aviation, Machine Learning & AI, Microelectronics & Robotics, Manufacturing & Logistics, Agriculture & Foodtech, Fintech & Insurtech, B2B & Enterprise, Big Data & Analytics, Internet of Things, Maritime, Retail, Healthtech, Blockchain, VR & AR.

name: 5G Ventures
description: 5G Ventures S.A, a Hellenic Corporation of Assets and Participations subsidiary, manages Phaistos Fund and signals an innovative approach in supporting a thriving 5G ecosystem in Greece. Phaistos Fund supports enterprises that develop 5G-related products & services and is an effective bridge between State & Private investments, as it brings together the best of the two worlds. It offers unique capabilities and, through its focus on 5G market, Phaistos is best positioned to produce remarkable returns as well as national economic growth.
investmentAreas: 5G, telecoms, AI

name: Uni.Fund
description: UniFund aims to ignite entrepreneurship by leveraging the hidden potential within Greek universities, R&D, and tech spaces, focusing on people and team development. They invest in sectors such as ICT, fintech, health-tech, IoT, robotics, and more, providing seed funding and support to early-stage startups. UniFund's experienced team helps startups implement successful go-to-market strategies and build the foundations of the entrepreneurial ecosystem.
investmentAreas: ICT, fintech, health-tech, IoT, robotics

name: Velocity Partners
description: Velocity.Partners is an industry-agnostic venture capital fund dedicated to fueling Greek entrepreneurs globally, helping them build world-class technology companies. They invest in pre-Seed and Seed stages, typically up to EUR 500K, and support their portfolio companies with team building, product-market fit validation, market traction, and preparation for larger VC funding. Velocity.Partners provides access to a global network of experts, investors, and clients, along with lifelong operational support, strategic advice, and mentoring.
investmentAreas: industry agnostic, Aerospace, Automotive, Consumer, Industrial, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Marketplace, Medical, Software,

name: L-Stone Capital
description: LStone Venture Capital invests in early-stage businesses at the Seed and Seed+ stages, focusing on €500k+ investments, particularly in Greece. They support ambitious management teams in growing scalable international businesses aligned with key megatrends such as digital evolution, healthier living, and sustainability. Their portfolio features industry leaders and disruptors, offering global network access, operational support, team development, and marketing exposure.
investmentAreas: ESG, AI, Robotics, greentech

name: Global Finance
description: Global Finance, founded in Athens in 1991, is an independent investment firm that has pioneered private equity and venture capital in the region and has established an exceptional investment track record. Global Finance's operations consist of private equity fund management, real estate development and advisory services covering South-Eastern Europe. Global Finance manages a number of funds, each with a distinctive, clearly defined geographic and investment focus, supporting the regional expansion of businesses in Greece and abroad.
investmentAreas: Financial Contracts, Investing, Finance, Insurance, Financial Advisers, Consulting & Professional Services, Venture Capital

name: Elikonos Capital Partners
description: An independent boutique corporate finance firm based in Athens. Established in 2009, by seasoned professionals with proven track record of financial and operating experience, provides specialized services in the fields of corporate finance, investing and strategic development. The management team brings years of professional services experience in the fields of asset management, private equity, corporate finance and IPO advisory. Moreover, the management has strong operating experience in the sectors of logistics, technology, mobile marketing and advertising, healthcare, media, food and e-commerce
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Venture Capital

name: TECS Capital
description: Venture Stories Partners S.A. (VSP) is an Limited Alternative Investment Fund Manager (LAIFM) domiciled in Greece with its headquarters in Thessaloniki (AIFM national code: GR027000 | VAT number: EL801322351). VSP is also registered with the Greek Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). VSP is always interested in new venture opportunities focusing on commercializing research, finding new network associates and collaborations with partners abroad and developing new tools to provide state of the art services to its investees.
investmentAreas: Financial Contracts, Investing, Finance, Insurance, Consulting & Professional Services, Venture Capital

name: PJ Tech Catalyst
description: At PJ Tech Catalyst Fund, our time is invested in helping your business vision succeed and our passion is in creating the best opportunities for Greek entrepreneurs.Established in 2012, the PJ Tech Catalyst Fund is a venture capital fund that invests in seed stage startup companies with a focus on Information and Communication Technology (ICT) and supports the development of entrepreneurship in Greece. Our office is located in the heart of Athens allowing us to be where entrepreneurial events and startups congregate.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Venture Capital

name: Attica Ventures
description: Attica Ventures aims to invest in innovative small and medium enterprises (SMEs) that are in their development phase, hold a distinctive competitive advantage and have excellent potential for equity appreciation and international competitiveness and presence, regardless of the industry they compete. Our target size of investment is between € 3-7 million, but we are able to accommodate any size of investment in cooperation to strategic partners and/or co-investors. In most of the cases we intend to take minority stakes, supporting the management achieving their goals.
investmentAreas: Attica Ventures aims to invest in innovative small and medium enterprises (SMEs) that are in their development phase, hold a distinctive competitive advantage and have excellent potential for equity appreciation and international competitiveness and presence, regardless of the industry they compete. Our target size of investment is between € 3-7 million, but we are able to accommodate any size of investment in cooperation to strategic partners and/or co-investors. In most of the cases we intend to take minority stakes, supporting the management achieving their goals.

name: Startup Greece
description: Startup Greece supports and boosts the entrepreneurship and innovation ecosystem in Greece. Startup Greece is a private non-profit organization on a mission to promote, connect, and advance entrepreneurship for Greeks in Tech. Its vision is to bring the Greek Startup Ecosystem under the spotlight and maximize its contribution to a global level, by fostering innovation that will eventually secure sustainability and prosperity across the globe.
investmentAreas: Business Consulting, Entrepreneurship, Event Management, Business Development

name: Metavallon
description: Metavallon is a model social enterprise that empowers and accelerates startups at their very early stages. Metavallon is a Non-Profit and Research Organization that empowers and accelerates startups at their very early stages. Our mission is to uplift passionate enterprising spirits around the world and generate a powerful venturing movement across Europe.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), B2B, Biotechnology, Cyber Security, SaaS

name: Develop Greece
description: Develop Greece pioneers and operates as the first incubator for the development of innovative business ideas in the Greek entrepreneurial scene. Our goal is to uncover the expertise of local businesses and professionals through the provisions of individualized business plans and continuous guidance. Empowering businesses, creating digital impact.
investmentAreas: Advertising Service, Business Development, Digital Marketing, Email Marketing

name: IQbility
description: IQbility is a corporate business incubator offering high quality mentorship,angel funding and business networks to high potential startups. We have created an inspiring co-working space where your team can settle, work, meet and exchange ideas and experiences with other startups.
investmentAreas: Venture Capital, Private Equity Principals, Funding, Financing

name: Corallia – Hellenic Technology Cluster Initiative
description: With a vision 'to Greece with an environment that will allow science, innovation and entrepreneurship to flourish (again)'. Corallia is the first organisation established in Greece for the structured and systematic management and development of innovation clusters, in specific sectors and regions of the country, aiming at boosting competitiveness, entrepreneurship and innovation, in knowledge-intensive and exports-oriented technology segments, where Greece has the capacity to build a sustainable innovation ecosystem.
investmentAreas: Cluster Faciliator, Innovation, Accelerator, Youth Entrepreneurship

name: i4G
description: i4G is the first private business incubator in Greece and a leading hub for young entrepreneurs and startups. i4G, founded in 2003 operates a private state of the art building in Thessaloniki which can accommodate 20 - 25 early stage companies. The Incubator provides a start up ecosystem for young innovative companies to increase survival rates, create synergies and foster entrepreneurship and business opportunities.
investmentAreas: Early Stage Capital, Information Technology, Biotech, Environment, Materials

name: Aephoria.net
description: Aephoria.net is a sustainable-business education and incubation program for startup companies operating in Greece. Aephoria.net aspires to become a world class full fledged incubator for very early stage start ups developing any product or service condusive to sustainable development. We aim to attract people with raw ideas, encourage and actively guide them through to creating companies that find seed funding within 6 to 12 months, effectively creating seeds of sustainability.
investmentAreas: Sustainability, Green Economy, Professional Training, Coaching
